card.title: Voting events which contain the query

info.lead: A list of all the laws or acts which contain the searched query either in the title or in the summary and were voted on during this sitting.
info.text: Po naslovih in povzetkih vseh zakonov in aktov, obravnavanih v tem sklicu, poiščemo pojavitve iskalnega niza in izpišemo povezave do vseh tistih zakonov ali aktov, v katerih se pojavi njegova lema. Na koncu zakone oziroma akte razvrstimo po podobnosti z iskalnim nizom.
